        boolean canSliderPseudoAttack(int attacker,
                              int attackerPosition,
                              int targetPosition)
        Returns whether or not the attacker can attack the target position. The method does not check if a slider can reach the position.
        Parameters:
        attacker - the attacker.
        targetPosition - the target position.
        Returns:
        if the attacker can attack the target position.
